comments.en:
This is a driver developed for the HP Color LaserJet 2600n printer.

The driver supports 1-bit or 2-bit per pixel monochrome and color output, but none of these have been tuned for grayscale or color correction.

PPD files (and the Foomatic XML files to generate them) come with the driver, therefore we do not supply PPDs here on the OpenPrinting site.
